docs.lead_paragraph: A handful of states whose Republican governors oppose President Obama’s health care overhaul are quietly working to have an insurance exchange ready before the deadline next month to create one.

headline.seo: States Opposing Health Care Law Prepare for It Anyway
headline.main: Liking It or Not, States Prepare for Health Law
headline.print_headline: Liking It or Not, States Prepare For Health Law

docs.abstract: Officials in a handful of Republican-led states, who oppose President Obama's health care overhaul, are quietly working to have an insurance exchange ready before the November deadline to create one; Republicans who support state-run exchanges say they are embracing a fundamental conservative belief that states should make their own decisions rather than cede control to the federal government, but groups that oppose the law have sent emissaries around the country to argue that deferring to the federal government is a shrewder move.
docs.snippet: A handful of states whose Republican governors oppose President Obama’s health care overhaul are quietly working to have an insurance exchange ready before the deadline next month to create one.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration wants consumers to report mistakes and unsafe practices by doctors, hospitals and others who provide treatment.

headline.main: New System for Patients to Report Medical Mistakes
headline.print_headline: New System for Patients to Report Medical Mistakes

docs.abstract: Obama administration wants consumers to report medical mistakes and unsafe practices by doctors, hospitals, pharmacists and others who provide treatment; hospitals and even some doctors say the proposal has merit.

docs.lead_paragraph: It’s not the quantity of sleep that restores and refreshes, but the quality.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by reporter David Randall highlights research that seems to refute the conventional wisdom that a good night's rest consists of eight hours of uninterrupted sleep; examines the ways in which sleep patterns affect one's life, from productivity to memory.
docs.snippet: It’s not the quantity of sleep that restores and refreshes, but the quality.
